name: pluperfect

in or relating to the pluperfect: the pluperfect tense
More examplesFewer examples I was better at cooking than pluperfect passive subjunctives. In Galician, cantara is also the pluperfect form.

the grammatical tense used to describe an action that had already finished when another action happened. It is made with "had" and a past participle. Synonym
the past perfect
